pages.text: The $(item)Displacement Rune$() increases the flow rate of $(blood)Life Essence$() into and out of the altar when pumping to and from an external Tank multiplicatively by +20%

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:neovitae:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Displacement Rune$(), increasing the flow rate by a multiplicative +40% per rune.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
